org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.support
[Java] Class ClosureEventListener

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.support.ClosureEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hibernate.event.spi.SaveOrUpdateEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreLoadEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostLoadEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostInsertEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostUpdateEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostDeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreDeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreUpdateEventListener
@java.lang.SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked", "serial"})
public class ClosureEventListener

Invokes closure events on domain entities such as beforeInsert, beforeUpdate and beforeDelete.

Also deals with auto time stamping of domain classes that have properties named 'lastUpdated' and/or 'dateCreated'.

Authors:
Lari Hotari
Since:
1.3.5
